entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
